WorkItem.Description:
Hello, Improved Mangle seems broken. Adding/removing points out of this talent doesn't change the DPS rating. 
I also tried remaking the same talent build, but somehow the DPS rating is a lot lower than the original one.
Â 
I uploaded a picture with the original and redone build.
WorkItem.Summary: [Cat] When Building Talents, there is a significant DPS difference than selecting a prebuild

Comments.Message: Make sure trauma/mangle is unchecked in the buffs tab. Not sure about the dps rating being lower.

Ah yes, I unchecked mangle and in the buffs tab and it now Improved Mangle does change the DPS rating as normal.
Yeah, the 600+ DPS rating difference is still strange. I'm going to re-import my char with the same properties and see what DPS rating it gives me. Could be something from a previous version..

Ok, I re-imported my character from the armory, gave it the same buffs (without mangle buff) and Rawr gives me around 8250 DPS rating. 
After that I go to the talents tab, choose Untalented and make the same build. DPS rating drops again by ~660.
So It's either something going wrong when importing a character or when redoing the talents.

Btw. should I change my issue title to this "new" issue?
Yes, and please post before/after character files.
The second profile doesn't have any glyphs selected.  The saved profiles include glyphs but when you entered them manually, you didn't include the glyphs.

Ah yes, you are totally right. me /facepalm
Reason I didnt check the Glyph tab was, because I thought changing the talent build would only affect the Talent tab.
Could be a good idea to have a popup warning that you'll lose your Glyphes when building a "new" spec.
